```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(mapview)
library(nlgeocoder)
```

# Example

```{r}
library(nlgeocoder)
r <- nl_geocode( c("Henri Faasdreef 312", "Leidschenveen")) 
mapview::mapview(r)
```
